IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE IS TO FOSTER KNOWLEDGE AND UNDERSTANDING OF A RANGE OF NATIONAL SECURITY AND FOREIGN POLICY ISSUES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION IS TO FOSTER KNOWLEDGE AND UNDERSTANDING OF A RANGE OF NATIONAL SECURITY AND FOREIGN POLICY ISSUES. THESE EFFORTS WILL LEAD TO DEVELOPING AND WIDELY DISSEMINATING A NATIONAL SECURITY VISION AND STRATEGY FOR THE 21ST CENTURY.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: Other Income Part II, Line 10 Description: LEASE CHANGE SETTLEMENT 2018: 40000. Description: FEDERAL INCOME TAX REFUND 2022: 1680.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS PROCESSES PRESENTLY IN PLACE TO ENSURE THE MAINTENANCE OF ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS; TO IDENTIFY AND REPORT UNRELATED INCOME; TO DETERMINE ITS FILING AND TAX OBLIGATIONS IN JURISDICTIONS FOR WHICH IT HAS NEXUS; AND TO IDENTIFY AND EVALUATE OTHER MATTERS THAT MAY BE CONSIDERED TAX POSITIONS. THE ORGANIZATION HAS DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
THE ORGANIZATION'S OPERATING OFFICERS REVIEW FORM 990 PRIOR TO ITS SUBMISSION WITH THE IRS.

DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS ARE REQUIRED TO REPORT TO THE BOARD ANY FINANCIAL INTEREST WHICH THE OFFICER OR DIRECTOR DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY HAS IN ANY PERSON OR ENTITY WHICH IS A PARTY TO A TRANSACTION UNDER CONSIDERATION BY THE BOARD. THE INTERESTED DIRECTOR OR OFFICER IS REQUIRED TO ABSTAIN FROM VOTING ON THE TRANSACTION.
THE ORGANIZATION'S INDEPENDENT GOVERNING BODY APPROVES THE ANNUAL BUDGET, WHICH INCLUDES COMPENSATION OF THE CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER.
THE ORGANIZATION'S INDEPENDENT GOVERNING BODY APPROVES THE ANNUAL BUDGET, WHICH INCLUDES COMPENSATION OF OTHER OFFICERS.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKES AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION AND COPYING ALL DOCUMENTS REQUIRED TO BE MADE PUBLICLY AVAILABLE.
